qa_pairs.What is your return policy?: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase. Please ensure the item is in its original condition.
qa_pairs.Can I return an item after 30 days?: Unfortunately, returns are not accepted after 30 days from the date of purchase.

qa_pairs.How long does shipping take?: Shipping typically takes 5-7 business days for standard delivery.
qa_pairs.Do you offer expedited shipping?: Yes, we offer expedited shipping options at an additional cost.
